title: Prawn salad with avocado and lime
ingredients: ['570g cooked, deveined, shelled prawns', '3 avocados, peeled, pitted and diced', '1 bunch spring onions, white parts only, chopped', '3 large red tomatoes, diced', '1 large yellow tomato, diced', '1 pepper (any colour), chopped', '1/2 bunch coriander, chopped', '2 tablespoons fresh lime juice', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']
